question: Identify the social media engagement trends of major companies in the technology sector.

subtasks.task: Gather company data, focusing on those in the technology sector, and extract relevant metrics such as Revenue and Industry type from the CompanyInfo table.

Collect social media engagement data from all available social media tables (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube) associated with those companies to assess their engagement metrics like likes, comments, and shares.
Analyze and summarize the collected engagement data to identify trends such as which companies have the highest engagement rates or which platform is most utilized for marketing strategies.
Cross-reference the revenue data with the engagement metrics to investigate any correlation between financial performance and social media engagement levels in the technology sector.
